Plot: Juan is a teenager in a gang-infested LA barrio. When his Uncle Manny invites him out on a joy ride, the situation goes bad. Juan is accused of a crime he did not commit. Now Juan is caught between loyalty to his uncle and the Law.
Title: 1st Strike
Writer: Howard Cohen (screenplay), Lawrence Smilgys (screenplay), Lawrence Smilgys (story by)
Actors: Felipe Alejandro, Mariano Bigdawg, Kyara Campos, Jocelyn Cruz
